aboutpara: Hello! I am Soo Park and currently studying Computer Systems Technology at British Columbia Institute of Technology (BCIT). I formely worked as associate software developer intern at HP Teradici. I am interested in cloud solutions and web development.

resume.description: I completed an internship focused on cloud solutions, primarily using Terraform scripts on Azure. Additionally, I worked on two practicums involving web and mobile development using React.js, Next.js, and Flutter with Dart.
